## ðŸ“‚ Installation

You have to install [Stylus](https://add0n.com/stylus.html) and then click on the install link below.

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Chrome-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Firefox-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/styl-us/)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Firefox-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://addons.opera.com/en/extensions/details/stylus/)


[![Install Stylus](https://img.shields.io/badge/Install%20Fixed%20Facebook%20Post%20with-Stylus-116b59.svg?longCache=true&style=fla)](https://userstyles.world/style/7969/fixed-facebook-post)
